com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface IColorPickerRenderer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IColorPickerRendererProxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardColorPicker

    public interface IColorPickerRenderer
    Interface abstracting the rendering of a color picker.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDefaultHeight(int width)
      Returns the default height.
      void renderPicker(Context context, boolean focus, java.awt.Color color)
      Renders the color picker.
      java.awt.Color transformPoint(Context context, java.awt.Color color, java.awt.Point point)
      Map a point on the color picker to a color.

    • Method Detail

      • renderPicker

        void renderPicker(Context context,
                  boolean focus,
                  java.awt.Color color)
        Renders the color picker.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        focus - the focus state
        color - the currently selected color

      • transformPoint

        java.awt.Color transformPoint(Context context,
                              java.awt.Color color,
                              java.awt.Point point)
        Map a point on the color picker to a color.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        color - the currently selected color
        point - the point to be mapped
        Returns:
        the color corresponding to the point on screen

      • getDefaultHeight

        int getDefaultHeight(int width)
        Returns the default height.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the color picker
        Returns:
        the default height
